snippet: After showing early promise, Toronto plummeted out of playoff contention, fired its coach and endured fans’ tossing team jerseys onto the ice in protest over the team’s poor play.
abstract: Toronto Maple Leafs have suffered humiliating season, spiraling out of playoff contention, firing coach Randy Carlyle, and enduring resentment at home stadium, where fans took to dumping team jerseys onto the ice in protest of poor play.
lead_paragraph: After showing early promise, Toronto plummeted out of playoff contention, fired its coach and endured fans’ tossing team jerseys onto the ice in protest over the team’s poor play.

headline.main: Maple Leafs’ Season, Like Fans’ Discarded Jerseys, Lands in a Heap
headline.print_headline: Like Fans’ Discarded Jerseys, Maple Leafs’ Season Lands in a Heap
